title: U.S.-Cuba Talks First Step In Long Process Of Restoring Relations
teaser: U.S. diplomats have wrapped up two days of talks with Cuban officials â€” the highest-level meeting in 35 years. The aim is to start talking through how to restore diplomatic relations following the historic warming of ties announced last month by President Obama and President Raul Castro.
